item.title: Webclient problem- Only I can use it?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So when I first put my webclient on the interwebz anyone could play and people did. I recently updated the cache (added some stuff) and made some minor tweaks in the client. Now after Jaring and signing it. No one can play but me.
It downloads cache for them and everything. I don’t know what error they get when they do but I’m told it’s the black screen with the loading bar saying “Error loading please report”
Edit:

Snippit from my client.java:

{ drawLoadingText(0, "Connecting to File Server..."); new Update("http://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/AbstractPK2.zip", "AbstractPK2.zip", signlink.findcachedir()); abyte0 = decompressors[0].decompress(i); }
Signlink.java:

public static String findcachedir() { String as[] = {"C:/"}; if(storeid < 32 || storeid > 34) storeid = 32; String s = "AbstractPK2";
and Cachedownloader.java:

private final int VERSION = 1; // Version of cache private String cacheLink = "http://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/AbstractPK2.zip"; // Link to cache

Read full topic
item.source: Webclient problem- Only I can use it?
